entrustment_words:
Precious daughter, the flame of intercession burns with holy intensity. It is not an easy flame to carryâ€”it demands sacrifice, requires vigilance, and costs everything.

For decades I have stood in the gap, carried the burdens, wept the tears, and contended for breakthrough. This flame has consumed my nights and fueled my days.

I now entrust it to you. Let it burn in your prayer closet, ignite your midnight cries, and empower your prophetic stand. The world needs intercessors who will not grow weary.
